definitions.definition: In a fluent manner, as expressing oneself easily, especially in a foreign language.
examples: He lived in Mexico, so he is able to speak Spanish fluently .

definitions.definition: In a fluent manner, as having graceful movements.
In a fluent manner, as literally flowing.

main_definition: In a fluent manner, as expressing oneself easily, especially in a foreign language.
secondary_definitions: In a fluent manner, as having graceful movements.
In a fluent manner, as literally flowing.
